TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Enable Anima Tweaks
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: This entire section is disabled by default for compatibility sake mostly, some Anima related tweaks function regardless of if they've been changed (any changing a radius for example) so this allows them all to be skipped over without any potential for conflicts if you prefer another anima tweak mod.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Anima Grass Per Psylink Level
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: The values are the amount of grass needed to be grown on top of what was already needed for the previous level.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Meditation Psyfocus Gain Rate
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: The amount of psyfocus a pawn gains per day of mediation.

TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.label: Anima Scream
TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.description: Tweaks specific to the anima scream from when you cut down the anima tree.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Disable Anima Scream
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Disables the Anima Scream debuff from chopping them down.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Anima Scream Debuff
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: The impact on mood from the thought applied.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Anima Scream Duration
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: The duration on the thought applied, in days.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Anima Scream Stack Limit
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: The stack limit for the thought applied.

TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.label: Anima Tree
TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.description: Tweaks specific to the anima tree itself.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Replantable Anima
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Makes it so you can move Anima trees like any other.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Artificial Building Radius
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: The radius in which a debuff is applied to the trees effects if artificial buildings are built in it.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Natural Building Radius
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: The radius in which a buff is applied to the trees effects for natural buildings.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Natural Building Max
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: The maximum number of buildings which can buff the Anima Tree.

TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.label: Anima Shrines
TweaksGalore.TweakSubSectionDef.description: These are specific to the nature shrines that can be built to enhance the Anima tree.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Nature Shrines Always Buildable
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: Nature Shrines are usually only buildable when you have a nature based Psycaster, this unlocks that limitation.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Artificial Building Radius
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: The radius in which a debuff is applied to the trees effects if artificial buildings are built in it.

TweaksGalore.TweakDef.label: Natural Building Radius
TweaksGalore.TweakDef.description: The radius in which a buff is applied to the trees effects for natural buildings.
